text: Philippe Guerdat (born 21 April 1952) is a Swiss equestrian. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from the canton of Jura
title: Philippe Guerdat
